lines.text: It's, uh... not blood, it's... red-hot molten metal!
The hay wire, from the fire! It melted!
The haywire that we found in the pile, not melted?
Which the corpse is lyin' in, without catchin' on fire?
Which ain't givin' off any heat? Or glowin'?
You... can't prove that those things are true.
I mean, you could probably prove it a little...
Walk it back to the land of sane ideas from reality, kid.
